Document.Focus: Using your shoulder after replacement surgery

Synonyms.Synonym: Joint replacement surgery - using your shoulder

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Using your shoulder after replacement surgery
QAPair.Answer: You had shoulder replacement surgery to replace the bones of your shoulder joint with artificial parts. The parts include a stem made of metal and a metal ball that fits on the top of the stem. For a total shoulder replacement, a plastic liner is used as the new surface of the shoulder bone's joint. Now that you are home you will need to know how to protect your shoulder as it heals.
